design_philosophy.vibe: Artisanal, Hygienic, Trustworthy, Premium yet Accessible
design_philosophy.core_principle: Elevate the raw product. Meat is the hero. Red is the passion, White is the hygiene.

typography.instructions: Import 'Playfair Display' (weights: 400, 700) and 'Manrope' (weights: 400, 500, 600) from Google Fonts. Use Playfair for all H1-H3 headings to give that 'premium butcher shop' feel. Use Manrope for all UI text, prices, and descriptions.

primary.description: Crimson Red / Dried Blood - The color of fresh, high-quality meat. NOT bright red.

secondary.description: Bone White / Warm Cream - A softer, more organic alternative to pure white.

accent.description: Herb Green - For freshness indicators, 'In Stock' badges, and veg items.

colors.usage_rules: Use Primary Red for 'Add to Cart' buttons, Price tags, and key CTAs. Use Bone White for the main page background. Use pure White (#FFFFFF) only for Card backgrounds to make them pop against the Bone White page.

layout.grid_system: Mobile-first. Single column on mobile (grid-cols-1), Bento-style or 3-4 columns on desktop (md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4).
layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for containers. Gap-6 for grids.
layout.mobile_nav: Fixed bottom navigation bar for mobile users (Home, Categories, Cart, Profile/Admin). This is crucial for the 'App-like' feel.

buttons.secondary: bg-white text-foreground border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground

cards.product: bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm border border-border/50 overflow-hidden hover:shadow-md transition-shadow group
cards.category: relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl aspect-[4/5] group cursor-pointer

visual_enhancers.texture: Use subtle noise or grain on the Bone White background if possible, or keep it clean. Use the 'Spices' image as a parallax section background.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows (shadow-lg) for floating elements like the Cart sheet or Mobile Nav.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px borders in very light gray (#E5E7EB) to define structure without heaviness.

hero.alt: Premium cuts of meat on a wooden board
hero.usage: Hero section background with dark overlay (bg-black/50)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Import fonts in index.css.
2. THEME: Update tailwind.config.js to use the custom colors defined above (Primary: #991B1B, Background: #FDFBF7).
3. LAYOUT: Build a 'MobileNav' component fixed at the bottom for screens < md.
4. HOME: Create a Hero section using the 'hero' image. Text should be 'Fresh Meat, Delivered to Your Door'.
5. PRODUCTS: Use the 'cards.product' style. Display 'Weight' and 'Price' clearly. Add to Cart button should be prominent.
6. CART: Use a Sheet (Side drawer) for the cart. Checkout flow is: Review Items -> Enter Pincode (Validate 500001-500004) -> Enter Address -> WhatsApp Redirect.
7. ADMIN: Simple PIN entry screen (centered, minimal). Dashboard should show orders in a table.
8. DATA: Mock the product data initially, but structure it for the backend (id, name, category, price, stock, image).
9. CRITICAL: Ensure the 'Red' is the deep crimson specified, NOT default Tailwind red-500.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
